author: aldcroft
description:
Description: Parse, manipulate, and generate http://wiki.ivoa.net/twiki/bin/view/IVOA/IvoaVOEvent XML packets
Homepage URL:https://github.com/timstaley/voevent-parse

A bare-bones, lightweight library for parsing, manipulating, and generating VOEvent XML packets.

voevent-parse is available on PyPI and can be installed using:

  pip install voevent-parse
title: voevent-parse
